backend/main.mo: Defines game and player stats types, stores last five games in maps, and exposes methods to store and retrieve game data.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files related to player stats, props, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles and OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing player selection, data ingestion, offered props, and displaying recommendations.
frontend/src/features/playerProps/backen: Client class that fetches stored last five games from the backend and converts them to frontend input format.
frontend/src/features/playerProps/compon: Form for entering a player name, validating it, fetching last five games, and showing results or errors.
Sidebar UI for choosing a sportsbook and adding or removing offered prop lines used to filter recommendations.
UI component rendering prop recommendations with loading, error, and filtering states.
frontend/src/features/playerProps/hooks/: Mutation that fetches a player's last 5 games from BallDontLie API, converts them, and stores them in the backend.
Query hook that retrieves a player's last five games from the backend actor.
Empty file placeholder for a mutation hook.
Query hook that computes and optionally filters prop recommendations based on recent game stats.
Type definitions for game stats, offered props, and prop recommendations.
frontend/src/features/playerProps/utils/: Helpers for normalizing prop types, matching recommendations to offered props, and formatting labels.
frontend/src/features/playerProps/valida: Validation utilities for player names and game stat inputs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, providing login, logout, and identity loading across the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended colors, typography, container queries, animations, and custom theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for an automated player-stats ingestion and recommendation system.
